entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 9.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 8:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Smoke
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Widespread smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
